item.title: Learning Vega 2.0 a.k.a. Reactive Vega
item.description: h1 ~ aside { font-size: small; right: 0; position: absolute; width: 180px; } A Grammar of Graphics Vega 2.0 adds a grammar of interaction to the grammar of graphics implemented in Vega 1.0. When you say grammar of graphics all roads bring you to Leland Wilkinson The Grammar of Graphics Springer Science & Business Media, Jul 15, 2005 But given the price of 100+ USD, I am not even thinking of getting my hands on it.
